name: monolith: objkt-1
description: monolith is a conceptual eclectronica album project of ikaru. during the production process of this album, we've tried to come up with visual ideas to complement the story and one of these ideas to have a collective acid trip with our close circle friends to depict one song of the album each. after each track is sensually depicted within a rapid-painting process, we mixed all of the paintings into a single artwork, resonating with our idea of a monolith throughout the album.
